article: the senate rejected several democratic amendments to proposed bankruptcy legislation on thursday , including one that would have closed a loophole that lets wealthy people protect millions of dollars in assets from creditors even after filing for bankruptcy .
abstract: senate rejects efforts to alter bankruptcy legislation
